titles.title: A resolution honoring the memory of Dr. William R. ("Bill") Bright and commending his life as an example to succeeding generations.
A resolution honoring the memory of Dr. William R. ("Bill") Bright and commending his life as an example to succeeding generations.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Honors the memory of Dr. William R. Bright (founder of Campus Crusade for Christ International and the Global Pastors Network). Expresses condolences to his wife (Vonette Zachary Bright), their grandchildren, their sons (Zac and Brad), and their wives (Terry and Katherine).
